name: Euro Guarantees Group Ltd
goal: Euro Guarantees Group is an independent, English Group, with a strong international presence. Established in 2015, it is among the world’s leading insurers and it is present in over 20 countries. The Group has a leading position in Western Europe and an increasingly significant presence in the markets of Central and Eastern Europe and Middle East.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Solvency II
- Sistemic risk
- Revision of the Insurance Distribution Directive (IDD)
- IGS – Insurance Guarantee Schemes
- Data Protection
- Guarantees
- International Accounting Standards
- Anti-discrimination
- Climate change
- CMU
